text: Nicholas deBelleville "Nick" Katzenbach (January 17, 1922 – May 8, 2012) was an American lawyer. He was the United States Attorney General during the Lyndon B. Johnson administration. He was Attorney General from February 1965 through October 1966. ==Other websites== *Oral History Interviews with Nicholas Katzenbach, from the Lyndon Baines Johnson Library *Artículo en español del diario "El País", 26 de mayo de 2012, "Nicholas Katzenbach, crucial político en la sombra" Category:1922 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Alumni of the University of Oxford Category:Lawyers from Philadelphia Category:American military personnel of World War II Category:Episcopalians Category:Politicians from Philadelphia Category:Princeton University alumni Category:United States Attorneys General Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Yale University alumni Category:United States Deputy Attorneys General
title: Nicholas Katzenbach
